function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Online survey questionnaires completed during lockdown may introduce selection bias.","Impact":"Biased sample may lead to unreliable results and conclusions.","Mitigation":"Use random sampling and ensure diverse participation to reduce bias.","Technologies":"Random sampling techniques, survey incentives, and outreach to underrepresented groups.","People":"Researchers conducting the survey, participants in the study.","Owner":"Research team, survey organizers."},{"Description":"Exclusion of participants with no garden access may introduce selection bias and limit generalizability of results.","Impact":"Limitation in understanding the impact of gardening on health outcomes for individuals without garden access.","Mitigation":"Consider including participants without garden access in the analyses, or conduct separate analyses for this subgroup.","Technologies":"Stratified analyses, sensitivity analyses, and subgroup analyses.","People":"Researchers conducting the analyses, individuals without garden access.","Owner":"Research team."},{"Description":"Limited representation of younger age groups in the sample may skew the results and limit generalizability to a broader age range.","Impact":"Findings may not be applicable to younger populations, limiting the broader relevance of the study.","Mitigation":"Ensure targeted recruitment of younger participants to improve age diversity in the sample.","Technologies":"Social media outreach, targeted advertising, and community engagement.","People":"Researchers conducting the study, younger potential participants.","Owner":"Research team."}]}
